smacc_action_client_base.h
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 /*****************************************************************************************************************

6 #pragma once
7 
8 #include <smacc/smacc_action_client.h>
9 #include <queue>
10 
11 namespace smacc
12 {
13 // Smacc Action Clients (AKA resources or plugins) can inherit from this object
14 // inhteriting from this class works as a template .h library. That is why the code
15 // implementation is located here.
16 template <typename ActionType>
17 class SmaccActionClientBase: public ISmaccActionClient
18 {
19  public:
20 
21  // inside this macro you can find the typedefs for Goal and other types
22  ACTION_DEFINITION(ActionType);
23  typedef actionlib::SimpleActionClient<ActionType> ActionClient ;
24  typedef actionlib::SimpleActionClient<ActionType> GoalHandle;
25 
26  typedef typename ActionClient::SimpleDoneCallback SimpleDoneCallback ;
27  typedef typename ActionClient::SimpleActiveCallback SimpleActiveCallback;
28  typedef typename ActionClient::SimpleFeedbackCallback SimpleFeedbackCallback;
29 
30  SmaccActionClientBase(int feedback_queue_size=10)
31  :ISmaccActionClient()
32  {
33  feedback_queue_size_= feedback_queue_size;
34  }
35 
36  virtual void init(ros::NodeHandle& nh) override
37  {
38  ISmaccActionClient::init(nh);
39  client_ = std::make_shared<ActionClient>(name_,false) ;
40  }
41 
42  virtual ~SmaccActionClientBase()
43  {
44  }
45 
46  virtual void cancelGoal()
47  {
48  ROS_INFO("Cancelling goal of %s", this->getName().c_str());
49  client_->cancelGoal();
50  }
51 
52  virtual SimpleClientGoalState getState() override
53  {
54  return client_->getState();
55  }
56 
57  virtual bool hasFeedback() override
58  {
59  return !feedback_queue_.empty();
60  }
61 
62  void sendGoal(Goal& goal)
63  {
64  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Sending goal to actionserver located in " << this->name_ <<"\"");
65 
66  if(!client_->isServerConnected())
67  {
68  ROS_INFO("%s [at %s]: not connected with actionserver, waiting ..." , getName().c_str(), getNamespace().c_str());
69  client_->waitForServer();
70  }
71 
72  ROS_INFO_STREAM(getName()<< ": Goal Value: " << std::endl << goal);
73 
74  SimpleDoneCallback done_cb ;
75  SimpleActiveCallback active_cb;
76  SimpleFeedbackCallback feedback_cb = boost::bind(&SmaccActionClientBase<ActionType>::onFeedback,this,_1);
77 
78  client_->sendGoal(goal,done_cb,active_cb,feedback_cb);
79 
80  stateMachine_->registerActionClientRequest(this);
81  }
82 
83 protected:
84  std::shared_ptr<ActionClient> client_;
85  int feedback_queue_size_;
86  std::list<Feedback> feedback_queue_;
87 
88  void onFeedback(const FeedbackConstPtr & feedback)
89  {
90  Feedback copy = *feedback;
91  feedback_queue_.push_back(copy);
92  ROS_DEBUG("FEEDBACK MESSAGE RECEIVED, Queue Size: %ld", feedback_queue_.size());
93  if(feedback_queue_.size()> feedback_queue_size_)
94  {
95  feedback_queue_.pop_front();
96  }
97  }
98 
99  virtual void postEvent(SmaccScheduler* scheduler, SmaccScheduler::processor_handle processorHandle) override
100  {
101  EvActionResult<Result>* ev = new EvActionResult<Result>();
102 
103  boost::intrusive_ptr< EvActionResult<Result>> actionClientResultEvent = ev;
104  actionClientResultEvent->client = this;
105 
106  scheduler->queue_event(processorHandle, actionClientResultEvent);
107  }
108 
109  virtual void postFeedbackEvent(SmaccScheduler* scheduler, SmaccScheduler::processor_handle processorHandle) override
110  {
111  boost::intrusive_ptr< EvActionFeedback<Feedback> > actionFeedbackEvent = new EvActionFeedback<Feedback>();
112  actionFeedbackEvent->client = this;
113 
114  bool ok = false;
115  if(!feedback_queue_.empty())
116  {
117  ROS_DEBUG("[%s]Popping FEEDBACK MESSAGE, Queue Size: %ld", this->getName().c_str(), feedback_queue_.size());
118  Feedback feedback_msg = feedback_queue_.front();
119  feedback_queue_.pop_front();
120  ROS_DEBUG("[%s]popped FEEDBACK MESSAGE, Queue Size: %ld", this->getName().c_str(), feedback_queue_.size());
121  actionFeedbackEvent->feedbackMessage = feedback_msg;
122  ok = true;
123  }
124  else
125  {
126  ok = false;
127  };
128 
129  if(ok)
130  {
131  //ROS_INFO("Sending feedback event");
132  scheduler->queue_event(processorHandle, actionFeedbackEvent);
133  }
134  }
135 
136  friend class SignalDetector;
137 };
138 }
